EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: Residential Trips - notary templates
EmailTemplate.subject: Residential Trips - notary templates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents
As requested by several parents, please find attached sample notary letters for our residential trips to France and Oman. The notary letters you prepare should be very similar to the format in the examples although it is fine if the wording is slightly different. If you present this document at a notary office they should know what to prepare for you.
Template Oman Template France
Kind regards,
Michelle Hamilton
Secondary Phase Leader
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
